DataElement.preferredName: Patient Informed Consent Timepoint Protocol Version Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Protocol version number  of a consent signed at a timepoint by a patient for a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved._A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications._The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled._A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved.:A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.:A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.

Concepts.definition: Consent by a patient to a surgical or medical procedure or participation in a clinical study after achieving an understanding of the relevant medical facts and the risks involved.
A form or variant of a type or original; one of a sequence of copies of a program, each incorporating new modifications.
A specific point in the time continuum, including those established relative to an event.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The text that describes the generation of the protocol._A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: PBTC 18Nov2015 Rep Term changed 20 July 2016 sr

DataElement.changeDescription: PBTC 25 July 2016 Version 2.0  due to updating the definition to human readable and a new version of the VD.
